name: Beider's Shooting Game
description:
This is the prototype to my upcoming shooting game.

Currently it is only a survive 15 waves of enemies, however the final game is intended to have multiplayer and be quite different.

Currently contains:

  • 9 Weapons
  • 14 Powerups
  • 8 Consumable Items
  • 50+ Perks
  • 5 Monsters
  • 2 Bosses (Wave 10 + 15)
